pr_title: User Management Service: /register endpoint refactoring and integration with oauth-scim-service

timeline.message: /register implementation and new auth server integration with test cases.

timeline.bodyText:
why is unauthorized the very last fallback?
this is something we should identify at the very start of a call and not risk potentially leaking other information out to unauthorized users.
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: Fixed review comment
replies.author: madhurya-btc

timeline.bodyText: static imports should be added below normal imports
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: All developers IDE configured to have static import first and then import statements. We've used this settings for all the PR's raised so far. Please let me know the correct order of "Organize Imports", will ask the developers to change the IDE settings.
replies.author: dhanyak-btc

replies.bodyText: My mistake, You are correct.
replies.author: zohrehj

timeline.bodyText: Can we use the standard length for this instead of a onetime size?
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText:
I referred this SO post: What is the maximum length of a valid email address?
so we've used max length value as 320.
replies.author: dhanyak-btc

replies.bodyText: out of scope for this PR, but we should move this into the length constants and make sure every place is using the same length
replies.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: not that it matters much but the post mentions 254 character as the max length
replies.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: Fixed for this PR, but needs to be addressed in multiple places, Issue: #797 We'll fix this in follow-up PR.
